customer_reviews.author: Cathyj000

customer_reviews.title: soft curls
customer_reviews.text: this products consistency is really smooth and runny so its super easy to apply onto hair, it smells nice and leaves my curls really soft as if i hadn't put any product in but defines curls still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. It smells like coconut to me and really defined my curls beautifully but didn't make my hair crunchy! On the other hand, I'm not sure if it was this seller or the other few I recently purchased from, but my card and bank account was compromised. Thank goodness for having a good bank, so luckily no money was actually stolen, but just beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kalei Johns

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! This helps eliminate frizz and keep my curls soft.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay, I have 3B curly, long hair. After using this, my hair wasn't much softer it actually made it more dry. I will not be using this product anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
